name: Please Sir, Can I Have S‚ÄôMore?
description:
Toasted Marshmallow squished onto a Graham Cracker and drizzled with Chocolate. 

Was watching Wayne‚Äôs Let‚Äôs Mix video the other day and realised I‚Äôd never made a S‚Äômores vape. Didn‚Äôt have FW GC so I left that out and tweaked his recipe slightly to get as close as possible to my ideal s‚Äômore. 
If you want his exact recipe you‚Äôll have to watch the vid as I don‚Äôt think it‚Äôs on ATF. 
Anyways, I kept the FA Cookie, TFA GCC and AP the same as his, banking on it giving me enough Graham without using FW, which it does... just! 
For the Marshmallow I opted for FW instead of FAs because it‚Äôs a more authentic artificial/gooey marshmallow flavour in my opinion. I love FAs but it wasn‚Äôt the type of Marshmallow I wanted to taste in this recipe. 
I had to add some TFA Toasted Marshmallow to ‚Äòtoast‚Äô the Marshmallow, gives a little diversity to it as well as the obvious toasted notes that I think helps the Cracker out a bit too. 
Totally agree with the FW VBIC. Gives a bit more weight to the Marshmallow and very subtle vanilla, without smacking you in the face with it like TFAs. 
Dropped the FA Meringue half a percent, so it‚Äôs an almost imperceptible sugary little accent.
I used the old INW Choc, but JFs would be fine in the same percentage. It‚Äôs not enough to scream Chocolate, but it‚Äôs there sitting nicely at the back end of the vape doing as it‚Äôs told. 
Super Sweet to enhance the perception of chocolate. Adjust to preference. 
And that‚Äôs that! 
It‚Äôs still not what I would consider ‚Äòperfect‚Äô, the only thing I think it‚Äôs lacking is the Graham Cracker. It‚Äôs there, underneath the ‚ÄòMallows but it could do with a boost. The Marshmallow and Chocolate are spot on in my opinion though.  Benefits from at least an overnight steep, more if you don‚Äôt enjoy fresher flavours.
Big thanks to Wayne for the base recipe to tweak from, legend as always! üëè
author: SweetPoisonKim
